import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Checkout = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: "", name: "", email: "", phone: "", address1: "", address2: "", city: "", state: "", zip: "", country: "", paymentMethod: "", captcha: "", }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post("http://localhost:5500/Checkout", formData); // Assuming the endpoint for checkout is /checkout // Reset form after successful submission setFormData({ title: "", name: "", email: "", phone: "", address1: "", address2: "", city: "", state: "", zip: "", country: "", paymentMethod: "", captcha: "", }); alert("Checkout successful!"); // Redirect to page after successful checkout navigate("/my-order"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error submitting checkout:", error); alert("Error submitting checkout. Please try again later."); } }; return ( <>

); }; export default Checkout;
